subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament
Basketball
lead_paragraph: MaryLynne Schaefer made a 3-pointer with 13 seconds left to put 10th-seeded Hartford ahead and then added two free throws to give the Hawks a 59-55 victory against Syracuse in the first round of the Oklahoma City Region of the N.C.A.A. women’s tournament Saturday in Baton Rouge, La.
